title: GRACE KARIN Women's Sexy Sequin Sparkly Glitter Ruched Party Club Dress Spaghetti Straps Wrap V-Neck Bodycon Dress
description: FEATURES: Spaghetti straps design, elastic shoulder straps, sparkling sequins, surplice V-Neck with hidden button, ruched front, irregular wrap hem, hidden zipper in the back, hits at mid-thigh, slim fit hips-wrapped silhouette, sexy bodycon party midi dress for women.
MATERIAL: The sequin material with comfy lining create a shiny effect, make you stand out in any occasion and show your charming, perfect for any party.
UNIQUE DESIGN: Spaghetti straps and spurplice v-neck, combined with ruched design highlights your perfect figures, make you look beautiful,glamorous,sexy and elegant.
OCCASION: The sexy v-neck sequin midi dress is great for clubs, cocktail party, evening, wedding party, dancing, dating, banquet, prom and any formal occasion.
NOTICE: Before order, please carefully read the Size Chart we provided in the pictures (Not Amazon size chart)
